title: Restaurer les permissions par d√©faut
description: Restaure toutes les permissions d'acc√®s des applications √† leurs valeurs par d√©faut Windows.

windowsCommandTemplate.name: Restore-DefaultAppPermissions
windowsCommandTemplate.commandPattern: $permissions = @('location', 'webcam', 'microphone', 'documentsLibrary', 'broadFileSystemAccess', 'contacts', 'appointments', 'email', 'userNotificationListener', 'phoneCall', 'radios', 'chat'); foreach ($perm in $permissions) { $path = "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\$perm"; if (Test-Path $path) { Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Allow' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }

examples.command: $permissions = @('location', 'webcam', 'microphone', 'documentsLibrary', 'broadFileSystemAccess', 'contacts', 'appointments', 'email', 'userNotificationListener', 'phoneCall', 'radios', 'chat'); foreach ($perm in $permissions) { $path = "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\$perm"; if (Test-Path $path) { Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Allow' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } -WhatIf
examples.description: Simulation de l'action sans ex√©cution r√©elle (dry-run). Le switch -WhatIf affiche ce qui serait modifi√© sans appliquer les changements. INDISPENSABLE avant toute action de masse ou modification critique. Retirez -WhatIf apr√®s validation pour ex√©cuter.

examples.command: $permissions = @('location', 'webcam', 'microphone', 'documentsLibrary', 'broadFileSystemAccess', 'contacts', 'appointments', 'email', 'userNotificationListener', 'phoneCall', 'radios', 'chat'); foreach ($perm in $permissions) { $path = "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\$perm"; if (Test-Path $path) { Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Allow' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } -Confirm:$false

examples.command: $permissions = @('location', 'webcam', 'microphone', 'documentsLibrary', 'broadFileSystemAccess', 'contacts', 'appointments', 'email', 'userNotificationListener', 'phoneCall', 'radios', 'chat'); foreach ($perm in $permissions) { $path = "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\$perm"; if (Test-Path $path) { Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Allow' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } -PassThru
examples.description: Force la commande √† retourner l'objet modifi√©/cr√©√© dans le pipeline. Par d√©faut, les cmdlets Set-/New- ne retournent rien. -PassThru active le retour pour permettre des op√©rations en cha√Æne ou des v√©rifications imm√©diates.

examples.command: $permissions = @('location', 'webcam', 'microphone', 'documentsLibrary', 'broadFileSystemAccess', 'contacts', 'appointments', 'email', 'userNotificationListener', 'phoneCall', 'radios', 'chat'); foreach ($perm in $permissions) { $path = "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\$perm"; if (Test-Path $path) { Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Allow' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } -Verbose
